Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.moveblocks

Class BlockMover

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.moveblocks.BlockMover
Direct Known Subclasses:
BigDoorMover, BridgeMover, FlagMover, GarageDoorMover, RevolvingDoorMover, SlidingMover, VerticalMover
public abstract class BlockMover extends Object
Represents a class that animates blocks.
Author:
Pim

  • Constructor Details

    • BlockMover

      protected BlockMover(BlockMover.Context context, AbstractDoor door, double time, boolean skipAnimation, RotateDirection openDirection, IPPlayer player, Cuboid newCuboid, DoorActionCause cause, DoorActionType actionType) throws Exception
      Constructs a BlockMover.
      Parameters:
      door - The AbstractDoor.
      time - The amount of time (in seconds) the door will try to toggle itself in.
      skipAnimation - If the door should be opened instantly (i.e. skip animation) or not.
      openDirection - The direction the AbstractDoor will move.
      player - The player who opened this door.
      newCuboid - The Cuboid representing the area the door will take up after the toggle.
      Throws:
      Exception

  • Method Details

    • playSound

      protected void playSound(PSoundDescription soundDescription)
      Plays a sound at the rotation point of a door.
      Parameters:
      soundDescription - The PSoundDescription containing all the properties of the sound to play.

    • abort

      public void abort()

    • applyRotation

      protected void applyRotation()
      Rotates in the openDirection and then respawns a ICustomCraftFallingBlock of a PBlockData. This is executed on the main thread.

    • respawnBlocks

      protected void respawnBlocks()
      Respawns all blocks. This is executed on the main thread.

    • startAnimation

      protected void startAnimation()
      Replaces all blocks of the AbstractDoor by Falling Blocks and starts the animation.

      Note that if skipAnimation is true, the blocks will be placed in the new position immediately without any animations.

    • getFinalPosition

      protected abstract Vector3Dd getFinalPosition(PBlockData block)
      Gets the final position of a PBlockData.
      Parameters:
      block - The PBlockData.
      Returns:
      The final position of a PBlockData.

    • executeAnimationStep

      protected abstract void executeAnimationStep(int ticks)
      Runs a single step of the animation.
      Parameters:
      ticks - The number of ticks that have passed since the start of the animation.

    • prepareAnimation

      protected void prepareAnimation()
      This method is called right before the animation is started (and after all variables have been initialized).

      It does not do anything by default.

    • getRadius

      protected float getRadius(int xAxis, int yAxis, int zAxis)
      Gets the radius of a block at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xAxis - The x coordinate.
      yAxis - The y coordinate.
      zAxis - The z coordinate.
      Returns:
      The radius of a block at the given coordinates.

    • getStartAngle

      protected float getStartAngle(int xAxis, int yAxis, int zAxis)
      Gets the starting angle of a block (in rads) at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xAxis - The x coordinate.
      yAxis - The y coordinate.
      zAxis - The z coordinate.
      Returns:
      The starting angle of a block at the given coordinates.

    • putBlocks

      public final void putBlocks(boolean onDisable)
      Places all the blocks of the door in their final position and kills all the animated blocks.

      When the plugin is currently not in the process of disabling, it also schedules the auto close.

      Parameters:
      onDisable - Whether the plugin is currently being disabled.

    • getNewLocation

      protected abstract IPLocation getNewLocation(double radius, double xAxis, double yAxis, double zAxis)
      Gets the new location of a block from its old coordinates.
      Parameters:
      radius - The radius of the block.
      xAxis - The old x-coordinate of the block.
      yAxis - The old y-coordinate of the block.
      zAxis - The old z-coordinate of the block.
      Returns:
      The new Location of the block.

    • getDoorUID

      public final long getDoorUID()
      Gets the UID of the AbstractDoor being moved.
      Returns:
      The UID of the AbstractDoor being moved.

    • getDoor

      public final AbstractDoor getDoor()
      Gets the AbstractDoor being moved.
      Returns:
      The AbstractDoor being moved.
